post:
Since we re-branded we've just realised the links on our old post are dead, and while these offers are still valid, some have been unable to redeem them. We're sorry, but we're here with some new links!

**<u><del>Austenite</del></u> <u>StableCloud</u>** provides affordable, secure and fast web hosting for many selective clients globally. Please see our offers below and do feel free to reach out to us should you have any further questions.

**Use coupon code LET50 at checkout to get 50% off any of our plans (annual billing only) on an ongoing basis! (Expires 27th of April and is limited to 100 customers - grab these while you can)** 

**<u>FEATURES</u>**

<ul>
<li>cPanel 
<li>Comprehensive DDoS Protection
<li>Six Global Locations 
<li>CloudLinux 
<li>LiteSpeed
<li><b>FAST</b> SSD Storage
<li><b>NEW!</b> MailChannels Filtering
<li>Softaculous
<li>Unlimited <b>FREE</b> SSL certificates
<li>PHP Selector (versions 5.6 to 7.2)
<li>99.99% Uptime SLA
<li>Self Healing Network 
<li>24/7 Expert Support
</ul>

**<u>PRICING & PLANS</u>**

The only limitation placed on our packages is the overall disk space, other resources such as bandwidth, MySQL Databases, Addon Domains and email accounts are totally unlimited. 

**SHARED 1**
-5GB SSD Storage
-Unlimited Bandwidth
-Unlimited Hosted Domains
